testimonials.text: He he is a very fast learner and completes his every tasks and college projects on time. He will surely be the good developer in future.

That Rabin Dhakal must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
